title: LAP: Deconstructing the Post-Neoliberal State: Intimate Perspectives on Contemporary Brazil
description: Tomas Ocampo, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews issue editors Wendy Wolford and John French on the subject of the March 2016 issue: "Deconstructing the Post-Neoliberal State: Intimate Perspectives on Contemporary Brazil."
content:encoded: Tomas Ocampo, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews issue editors Wendy Wolford and John French on the subject of the March 2016 issue: "Deconstructing the Post-Neoliberal State: Intimate Perspectives on Contemporary Brazil."
